Regulation Name(s): Calibrator, Secondary Single (specified) analyte controls (assayed and unassayed)
Analyte(s): autoantibodies to thyroid stimulating hormone (TSH) receptor
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Elecsys Anti-TSHR electrochemiluminescence immunoassay for quantitative measurement of anti-TSH receptor antibodies in human serum on the cobas e 601 analyzer
Indications for Use Summary: Immunoassay for quantitative determination of autoantibodies to TSH receptor in human serum to aid assessment of patients suspected of Graves' disease (autoimmune hyperthyroidism), for use on cobas e 601 immunoassay analyzers
